entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @JoyceWhiteVance Not only did they ignore the guidance, I'm sure they tossed it (along with the pandemic experts) only because they wanted to toss everything related to Obama. Their hatred for Obama has led them down many dark trails, but this is the 1 that's going to kill thousands of Americans!
